title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson ‘sober’ now and focusing on new romance
text:
Cody and Miley are pretty smitten (Picture: Miley Cyrus, Instagram)

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson have decided to adopt ‘sober’ lifestyles as their new romance continues to blossom, according to the singer’s manager who has shared an update on their relationship.

Following her recent break-ups from husband Liam Hemsworth and girlfriend Kaitlynn Carter, Miley went public with her new relationship earlier this month.

Since then, the Wrecking Ball singer has been pretty inseparable from Cody, 22, and it seems their relationship is on the right track.

In a rare statement, Miley’s rep has spoken out about their relationship in a statement to People.

Matt Zeidman, Miley’s manager, said: ‘It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realise.

‘Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they’re both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me.’

Miley, 26, recently addressed those wilder days while slamming reports that she had cheated on Liam with Kaitlynn.

Love is in the air (Picture: Miley Cyrus, Instagram)

‘I am the healthiest and happiest I have been in a long time. You can say I am a twerking, pot smoking, foul mouthed hillbilly but I am not a liar.

‘I am proud to say, I am simply in a different place from where I was when I was a younger.’

Of course, Miley was referring to those Bangerz days of sticking out her tongue and swinging on a wrecking ball.

Miley and Cody seem pretty smitten with each other. He’s already met her mother Tish Cyrus, who seems to approve, and was right by Miley’s side when she was in hospital with a throat infection.

And Cody’s mother, Angie, has also given the green light. Alongside a cosy photo of the new couple, Angie wrote on Instagram: ‘Puts a smile on my dial to see you both so blissfully happy.

‘Hearing your laughs and seeing the smiles on your faces lights up my heart #happyforyouguys #beautifullsouls @codysimpson @mileycyrus.’
